judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 3 Weeks Concurrent Consecutive to offence Consecutive to offence Test which is on case number 12DG456465. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for people and their property. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 6. Number of days in custody in foreign jurisdiction to count: 12. Total custodial period is life. Consecutive to sentence imposed on 01/06/2025, which was imposed by Aberdeen Sheriff Court District. Minimum term: 6 Months. Defendant sentenced without a pre-sentence report because Reason for sentence without PSR.
